entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
